attributes.action: Launch an enquiry into the recent decision by the BBC to appoint a Muslim to control the religous output of what is a christian country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC will cause serious controversy by its recent appointment of Aaqil Ahmed to control its religious output.  Britain is a Christian country and its majority Christian population already feel threatened and forgotten. This appointment will only reinforce these concerns and continue to create suspicion and anger amongst the Christian population.  This petition therefore asks the Prime Minister to launch a public enquiry into the reasons for this appointment.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
